question: Which state has recently decided to provide food kits to transgender persons of the state?
explanation:
The Government of Kerala has decided to provide food kits to 1,000 transgender persons in the state.
Kerala became the first state in the country to provide food kits to transgender during the 1st phase of lockdown in March 2020. The state government has now sanctioned food kits amounting Rs.700 each to 1000 transgender persons.
